summary: Biology focuses on the study of living organisms and their interactions with the environment. The sole article under this category delves into the concept of ecosystems, examining their application both in the natural world and metaphorically in fields like cryptocurrency. The overuse of 'ecosystem' in non-biological contexts highlights a shift towards less hierarchical structures and the role of the internet in transcending traditional spatial and temporal boundaries. No courses or profiles are currently listed.
excerpt: Ecosystems, once tied to biology, are now metaphorically overused in fields like crypto, indicating a desire for less hierarchical organizations. Modern ecosystems transcend space and time.
